meanings.definition: The quality of being sudden and unexpected.
meanings.sent1: The abruptnesses of the thunderstorm startled everyone in the park.
meanings.sent2: Her abruptnesses in conversation often caught people off guard.
meanings.sent3: The abruptnesses of the magician's disappearing act left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The abruptnesses of the plot twist in the movie took the viewers by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The abruptnesses of the car screeching to a halt made everyone jump.

meanings.definition: The state of being brief and curt.
meanings.sent1: I was taken aback by the abruptnesses of his response.
meanings.sent2: Her abruptnesses in emails sometimes come across as rude.
meanings.sent3: The abruptnesses of the cat's meow made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The abruptnesses of the teacher's instructions left the students confused.
meanings.sent5: The abruptnesses of the boss's feedback made me nervous.
